summary: This mod adds a few miscellaneous equipments you can use for party.
descriptionHtml:
First,I\'m not good at English. So there may be mistakes in this text.


This mod adds a few miscellaneous equipments. Detailed contents are following text.
The inside of a parenthesis explains a kind of armor or weapon.

[b]?Bouquet[/b](weapon) 198G
Rose:Red(blunt) / Blue(dagger) / White(dagger)
Gerbera:Orange(Blunt) / Pink(dagger)

[b]?funny glass[/b] 105G (slot 43,Cloth)

[b]?Party Hat[/b] (Armor) 105G
Blue / Red / Green /Orange(Circret)

[b]?Rabbit/Cat Shield[/b]
Cat : Beige(Heavy) / Grey(Light)
Rabbit : Black(Heavy) / White(Light)

[b]?Rabbit / Cat[/b] (you can travel forever along with a cat or rabbit) 398G
Cat : Beige / Grey (slot 57, Cloth)
Rabbit : Black / White(slot 57, Cloth)


These items are craftable in forge or anvil. And they exists in other category.
You can create in the amount of money on the right of equipment names.
And you can improve shields and weapons in workbench or grindstone.

[b]Requirements[/b] : Skyrim(1.9.32.0)
[b]Installation[/b] : Unzip files and copy to Skyrim folders.
[b]Uninstallation[/b] : Delete Data\\partyset.esp and Data\\meshes\\party folder and Data\\textures\\party folder.
[b]Tools used[/b] : Blender/Nifscope/Photoshop/Creation Kit
[b]Credits[/b] : Skyrim original meshes/textures
